item.title: canon 5250 printer install
item.description:
IKnowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)  
=================================================

Subject: Canon 5250 color laser network printer install

Revision History:
    2015-07-07 09:51:00 - Version 1 created by Bao

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)

Links:
  http://www.usa.canon.com/cusa/office/products/hardware/multifunction_printers_copiers/color_copiers imagerunner_advance_c5255#DriversAndSoftware

- Go to the Canon website and search for drivers for the 5250 color laser network printer. (or you can see the Links section above for the link).
- download the PS_v04.05.00_Mac.zip
- unzip the *.zip file and you will see a *.img.
- double click the *.img file
- Install the driver
- Go to Mac settings, and add a printer. Go through the prompts.
- select LPD for protocol (Very important that LDP is selected)
- Address: 172.16.10.33
- Select Generic PostScript Printer
- Continue through the prompts to get the printer installed.
- Print a test page. You should be good. If not, edit this KB with your findings.

=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be 
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of 
CTAC.```
